relation: Add a general KPart adapter to Kasten, than finish port of Okteta KPart to Okteta Kasten
Add global toggle option for the offset display, hex or decimal
Add Kate-like combined dialogs to query for actions on files
add support for import by drop, both url and data
add support for memory mapping of files and 64-bit addressing
add support for jobs like io, printing, string search or filter
copy again puts also a value or char variant of the data to clipboard
Improve the titels of the changes to the bytearray to be more descriptive, best using ids to avoid text string
Make all user interaction in the KastenCore managers plugin-based
Merge row and column widgets into one
Store bookmarks and other view settings for next load
Add custom datatypes to structures tool
